h1_title: Chapter 2 Secret - Kingdom of Sahali Walkthrough
content: This Chapter 2 Secret can only be accessed by meeting the Yellow-Robed Square in Fright Cliff (aka the Drunken Boar), and helping him in his search for the "Realm of Gold" which requires a few steps (and for you to best him in combat).
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Chapter_2_Secret-Kingdom_of_Sahali_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Chapter 2 Secret - Kingdom of Sahali Walkthrough'.
The content is as follows:
This Chapter 2 Secret can only be accessed by meeting the Yellow-Robed Square in Fright Cliff (aka the Drunken Boar), and helping him in his search for the "Realm of Gold" which requires a few steps (and for you to best him in combat).
